message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can see that you're willing to pay $12500, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower than this.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand you're still looking to save some money, Bob. However, I've already met you halfway from my original offer. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make a profit. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $13200. This is my next best offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower than this.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still trying to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $12800 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
